title: Game Crashing - Cant reconnect
body: SO i recently have come back to League, and my game randomly crashes during champ load in, and when i try to reconnect it says their is an issue with my internet service, even though I am usually listening music online or watching a stream on my 2nd monitor.  Hence nothing is wrong with my internet, any suggestions?

replies.body: Even though the music and stream are still working, that doesn't mean that your network isn't having problems reaching *our* servers. It's pretty common to be able to access some servers and not others at any given point, so let's try adjusting a few settings to make sure you can get a solid link with us. Check out the steps in this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and let me know if that doesn't help. Be sure to pay attention to the steps on port forwarding.

@Broporo , you've by now seen your fair share of posts pertaining to freezes, DC's, including DC's without the possibility to reconnect. Could you possibly forward this to Riot Tech with the intent that they may investigate on their end?
I ask this since I doubt that all the players having issues and posting here are from Western-Europe. 

(PS. Posting the requested logs in the other post  where you replied :) )

Have had the same. Reported on it here, and through a support ticket. At request I sent them ping-logs, and they told me it is my connection, despite the only ping / packet loss issue is to the Riot server in Chicago.
